intro: Psychotria djumaensis, commonly known as the Djumaensis Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, round berries that are typically green when immature and turn red when mature. Psychotria djumaensis is often found in moist, shaded forest understories and is valued for its ecological role in supporting local biodiversity.
